subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA (AP) — Pat Burrell hit a tie-breaking two-run homer in the sixth inning and the Philadelphia Phillies defeated the Braves, 4-3, on Thursday night to complete an unprecedented sweep of the nine-game season series in Atlanta.
snippet: ATLANTA (AP) — Pat Burrell hit a tie-breaking two-run homer in the sixth inning and the Philadelphia Phillies defeated the Braves, 4-3, on Thursday night to complete an unprecedented sweep of the nine-game season series in Atlanta.
